attributes.action: Stop using UK taxpayer pounds to fund EU bailouts by the back door.
attributes.additional_details: Recent announcements have told us that 3000 british forces and 250 civil servants will be compensated for the theft of their savings by the EU bailout of Cyprus, and rightly so.  However, our dishonourable electeds MUST make sure that any money paid out on this basis is either deducted from our next payment into the EU OR by taking it from the existing foreign aid allocation - since we are NOT members of the eurozone it is legitimate to take the money from the foreign aid budget.  THE UK TAXPAYER MUST NOT BEAR THE COST OF THE CONTINUING EUROZONE FAILURE.
